thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommend
thread.title_full: Highly recommend - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Zeb B
title: Highly recommend
text:
My daughter and I visited Rome for a few days and stayed at this hotel. We could not have been happier. The staff was wonderful - very helpful, kind, and informative.
The morning breakfasts were great - service very quick and friendly and nice selection of fruits, cereals, yogurts, cheeses, meats, and pastries.
Location was very good right next to the Pantheon - you could just pop in at any time. The square and surrounding area was very lively, and a number of great places to grab a bite nearby. The hotel was very helpful with suggestions that were just fantastic.
The room was very nice with a little private balcony. Seeing a partial view of the Pantheon was a treat.
We loved this hotel!
